alert.note: Alert for La Plata (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued May 18 at 3:16PM MDT until May 21 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Grand Junction has issued a Flood Advisory for the following rivers in Colorado... La Plata River at Hesperus affecting La Plata County. .The combination of warm, spring temperatures and potential for periods of rain falling on snowpack upstream will increase runoff. Water levels and flow in the La Plata River are expect to rise rapidly Friday night, nearing critical levels by Saturday morning. ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON TO SUNDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding caused by rain and snowmelt is expected. * WHERE...La Plata River at Hesperus. * WHEN...From this afternoon to Sunday evening. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1:30 PM MDT Thursday the stage was 4.9 feet. - Forecast...The river will oscillate around flood stage with a maximum value of 5.5 feet Saturday morning. - Action stage is 5.0 feet. - Flood stage is 5.5 feet. - Http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (3 pm MDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Fri Sat Sun La Plata River Hesperus 5.5 4.9 Thu 1 pm MDT 5.0 5.1 4.9 &&
info.instruction: If you encounter a flooded roadway, turn around and find an alternative route. Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely.
